name: cy_research
description: This is a research of cypress, also this project will be used to give demo of cypress

scripts.cy:UI:chrome:dash: npx cypress run --headed --browser chrome --spec cypress/e2e/tests/saucedemo --record --key f42a23f3-6492-474c-a914-17ef85d4ec7d
scripts.cy:API:chrome:dash: npx cypress run --headed --browser chrome --spec cypress/e2e/tests/api --record --key f42a23f3-6492-474c-a914-17ef85d4ec7d
scripts.cy:UI:edge:dash: npx cypress run --headed --browser edge --spec cypress/e2e/tests/saucedemo --record --key f42a23f3-6492-474c-a914-17ef85d4ec7d
scripts.cy:API:edge:dash: npx cypress run --headed --browser edge --spec cypress/e2e/tests/api --record --key f42a23f3-6492-474c-a914-17ef85d4ec7d

author: Marcela Lopez
